Good form.feedback: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship.

Poor taste.feedback: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.

Contrasting themes.feedback: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.

AI.feedback: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work.

Shading.feedback: While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.

Original work.feedback: Artwork created from gerenateive AI can not be original since it is trained on other artists work.

Accessible.feedback: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.

Has a Hat.feedback: Has a mix of brown, red and blue

Is wearing a jacket.feedback: Is not wearing a jacket, its more of a sweater.

Wearing a hoodie.feedback: The pig is wearing a pink hoodie.

Standing.feedback: The pig is standing, even though it may look like its not

Contrasting themes.feedback: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.

AI.feedback: This picture was taken with an iphone camera, so this is not AI generative work.

Accessible.feedback: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.
